alert.note: Alert for Coffee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 1:36PM CDT until June 15 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 136 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dozier, or 11 miles north of Opp, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elba, Lee, Pine Level, Wise Mill, New Haven, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Basin, Arcus, Danleys Crossroads, Woodland Grove Church and Camp Humming Hills. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM CDT for southeastern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM CDT for southeastern Alabama.
